Dear Kristina,

 

Tibiel is OK, the contact person will receive the login details soon

 

Toplo Vratza - just realized that the signature is missing , please sign the agreement and send it to us

 

Regarding Tibiel, Dimitar signed the agreement however Jana Galabova name is on it as a representative. Please modify and resend it (Dimitar’s name should be there under the signature)

 

The company extract will expire this week therefore I kindly ask you to request a new one (only for Tibiel and Toplo Vratza)

 

KR

Adriana

 

From: tbl_ood@mail.bg [mailto:tbl_ood@mail.bg] 
Sent: Friday, December 6, 2019 11:40 AM
To: Monori Adriána
Subject: Fwd: Remit

 

 

 
KELER SECURITY NOTICE: THIS EMAIL ORIGINATED FROM OUTSIDE THE KELER.

i send you the file with additional information which you asked for. Could you tell me if there something else which missing to complete the procedure?

Thank you in advance!

Best regards,

Kristina Lazarova
